name: AirPods 2
description: The AirPods 2 offer wireless freedom with high-quality sound and seamless integration with Apple devices.

name: iPhone 13
description: The iPhone 13 is a smartphone with a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and a dual 12MP camera system. It features a smaller TrueDepth camera system, improved battery life, and is rated IP68 for water and dust resistance.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 12
description: A budget-friendly smartphone with solid features for everyday use.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation and premium sound quality.

name: MacBook Air M2
description: Lightweight and powerful, the MacBook Air M2 is perfect for students and professionals alike.
